name: Move In or Move Out
description:
Submission for the IndieTales Game Jam 2021

Grandma has "volunteered" you to help her move into her new room! Be on your best behavior and inherit the family fortune! Only but one obstacle stands in your way: grandma's short temper for unruliness!

Rules: 

- Successfully move in all 8 pieces of furniture to win the game! 

- Be careful not to keep the workers or your sister waiting! If you fail to bring your sister a new box when she comes or move the furniture from the entrance when the workers drop it off, grandma will get increasingly angry. Once she boils over, you lose the game!

Controls:

Movement: WASD (Move to push furniture)

Pick up/Pull/Drag: Hold Space as you approach a Box/Furniture

Drop: Release the Space bar to drop any Box/Furniture

Project solo-developed by missingfox: https://twitter.com/MissingFox1
